# Frank Zappa for President__disambig_1

| recorded   =
| venue      =
| studio     =
| genre      = Rock
| length     = 43:17
| label      = Zappa RecordsCatalog Number: ZR 20021
| producer   = Ahmet Zappa, Joe Travers
| prev_title = The Crux of the Biscuit
| prev_year  = 2016
| next_title = ZAPPAtite
| next_year  = 2016
}}
Frank Zappa for President is a compilation album by American musician Frank Zappa, released in July 2016, consisting of unreleased compositions played on the Synclavier and unheard tracks relating to the uniting political thread that ties it all together.
Track listing
| headline      =
| title1        = Overture To "Uncle Sam"
| length1       = 15:16
| title2        = Brown Shoes Don't Make It (Remix)

| title4        = If I Was President
| length4       = 3:43

| length6       = 6:31
